subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king established the city of Udaipur?
question_hi: उदयपुर कौन सा जानवरी ने बनाया था?
explanation_en: Rao Jodha is the king who established the city of Jodhpur.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family ruled during the Mughal period?
question_hi: मुगोल परिवार के विभाग में कौन संतोष करते थे।
explanation_en: During the Mughal period, Todarmal Sisodiya of the Kachwaha Rajputs ruled in Ajmer.

question_en: Who ruled Rajput Rajasthan during the Chauhara period?
